A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi subverts almost everyone's expectations following The Force Awakens\, initially throwing dedicated Star Wars fans. However\, aside from a few petty details\, I feel that this film's unexpected twists and development along with its poetic nature have given the saga a new model\, rather than completely remaking the original trilogy. For me\, this fresh approach has made each re-viewing of the film more enjoyable and engaging than the last.
